snippet: Two Iranian citizens, whom officials accused of planning to attack Western targets inside Kenya, were found guilty on Thursday by a Kenyan court of terrorism-related charges.
abstract: Ahmad Abolfathi Mohammad and Sayed Mansour Mousavi, Iranian citizens accused of planning to attack Western targets inside Kenya, are found guilty by Kenyan court of terrorism-related charges.
lead_paragraph: Two Iranian citizens, whom officials accused of planning to attack Western targets inside Kenya, were found guilty on Thursday by a Kenyan court of terrorism-related charges.
